description:
Our team at ThePhillyLawyers has successfully taken hundreds of cases to trial and secured numerous settlements. We have several locations serving the Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, area. The personal injury, criminal defense and estate planning practices at our law firm include matters such as the following:

• Personal injury: construction accidents, motor vehicle accidents, dog bites and medical malpractice
• Criminal defense: drunk driving charges, drug crimes and federal crimes
• Estate planning: wills, powers of attorney and health care power of attorney

Client-focused and results-oriented, we guide the people we work with through these situations with compassion and integrity. Clients of our law firm receive personalized attention throughout every step of their case. We begin with a free initial consultation and can provide services in Spanish.

There are a number of reasons that our attorneys have earned widespread recognition. Our law firm consistently returns favorable results and has put compensation back in the hands of victims of negligence. Some of our accomplishments include being named Super Lawyers; holding an Avvo "Superb" rating; being selected for inclusion in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100; and being listed in the American Institute of Criminal Law Attorneys' 10 Best.

As a matter of convenience, ThePhillyLawyers accepts credit cards.
